Reviews.Title: NOT upgraded to 8g of ram
Reviews.Author: Buddy
Reviews.Content: It stated clearly that this laptop was upgraded to 8gb ram, but the machine only has 2gb of ram. Would love to have the other 6gb of ram to improve performance.

Reviews.Title: 4G, up to 8Gb of RAM win7 in 11.6" notebook. What do you need more?
Reviews.Author: Brian Wilson
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. I will add more memory and replace the HD with a SSD.It will be a perfect tool.

Reviews.Title: Current user for 3 years now
Reviews.Author: johann
Reviews.Content: I have used this laptop for three years - mostly for personal use limited to internet and Office. This laptop does the job. My only complaint is that it heats up extremely hot to the point that it feels dangerous to touch at and near the fan when this laptop is in operation over 8 hours straight. I sometimes leave the laptop on overnight; and the DM1 doesn't tolerate such continuous operation. As a result, my hard disk has broken, and I am in the market for a replacement. Look around, shop around. You may find a new laptop for $200 for Taiwanese brands.

Reviews.Title: Read Product Description
Reviews.Author: B. Crocker "Loves History and Architecture"
Reviews.Content: Read Product Description very carefully.  It has a small (tablet size) screen and no dvd drive. Not sure how you are supposed to watch movies. All available content would be online.
